greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of unitary divisors of central binomial coefficients.
comment: As in A034444, all terms are powers of 2.
link: Amiram Eldar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
example: At n=5, the central binomial coefficient is 10, having 4 divisors, each of which is unitary, so a(5)=4.
results.author: _Labos Elemer_
